channel.title: Sheridan County|Montana|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Sheridan County|Montana|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: MT-5 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on MT-5 west. Distance to Redstone, Flaxville, and Scobey.

item.title: MT-5 West - Speed Limit
item.description: Speed limit 70 MPH/Night Speed 65 MPH on MT-5 west.

item.title: MT-5 West at MTS-374 North
item.description: MT-5 West at MTS-374 North to Outlook.

item.title: MT-5 West Approaching MTS-374
item.description: MT-5 West approaching MTS-374 north to Outlook.

item.title: MT-5 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker for Flaxville and Scobey on MT-5 west, leaving Plentywood.

item.title: MT-5 West - Distance Marker
item.description: MT-5 west leaving Plentywood, Montana. In background is a distance marker for Flaxville and Scobey.

item.title: MT-16 North/MT-5 West at MT-16 North
item.description: MT-16 North/MT-5 West at MT-16 North to Raymond and Regina (SK, Canada). Raymond is the US Port of Entry on MT-16.

item.title: MT-16 North/MT-5 West Approaching Split
item.description: MT-16 North/MT-5 West Approaching MT-16/MT-5 split in Plentywood.

item.title: MT-5 West/MT-16 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on MT-5 West/MT-16 North. Distance to Plentywood, Scobey (via MT-5), and Regina (SK, Canada via MT-16).

item.title: MT-16 North at MT-5
item.description: MT-16 north at MT-5. Use MT-5 east to Westby. MT-5 west joins MT-16 north through Plentywood.

item.title: MT-16 North Approaching MTS-573
item.description: MT-16 North approaching MTS-573 in Medicine Lake.

item.title: MT-16 North at MTS-350 West
item.description: MT-16 North at MTS-350 West to Homestead.
